data.text: @Pikapidgey24 Yeah. I already prayed that she would birth a son and that son would also survive covid and I succeeded. Now it's time for me to help the mom no matter what because she deserves to be with her baby boy.
@NeutralHeart777 I totally understand that. You want them both to be as happy as possible and you don’t want him to grow up without his mom.

@Pikapidgey24 True. But: you know how I am...if it's my friends, then: I refuse to give up on her no matter what. Her son has already been through so much hell as a baby. I don't want him to be scarred for life when he's older. That's why I need to find every possible solution for the mom.

@NeutralHeart777 Honestly it depends on how bad off she is. It is possible to beat it, but if it’s stage 4 then it’s best to spend what time she has with her son. I know that sounds like she should give up, but I’m thinking about her and her son’s happiness. 😕
@Pikapidgey24 Wouldn't be more better to pay for better doctors though?
@NeutralHeart777 She could set up a Go fund me and make a bucket list with the money gained and try to do some stuff she’s always wanted to do then have some saved back for her baby. 😊
@NeutralHeart777 That’s awesome man, you’re a good human being. Her case needs to be taken to better hospitals if possible.

@regidank When it's one of my friends in danger, it's never fucking too late. I will sacrifice every living cell inside my entire body to make sure that she is safe with her baby boy by her side even if it kills me. She deserves to be the loving mother that she wants to be for her son.🔥❤️
@NeutralHeart777 Meanwhile the baby needs all the support possible, from you, his dad and other family members. Fuck cancer man.

@NeutralHeart777 I would suggest opening a gofundme but isn’t Stage 4 too late? I’m deeply sorry to hear about this. If at all, it’s up to the doctors to divulge the nature and effectiveness of the diagnosis. Then we can aim for a monetary goal.
